#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

long long A[500000];

int comp(void const* a, void const* b)
{
	return (*(int*)a - *(int*)b);
}

int main(void)
{
	int T;
	long long K, N, sum, i;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	
	while(T--)
	{
		getchar();
		
		scanf("%lld%lld",&N, &K);
		i=0;
		
		while(i<N)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&A[i]);
			i++;
		}
		
		qsort(A, N, sizeof(long long), comp);
		i=N-1;
		sum=0;
		
		while(K--)
		{
			sum+=A[i--];
		}
		
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
